name: Media
query:
select name as "ID:Link/Media:150",
media_type as Type,
media_sub_type as `Sub Type`,
media_owner as "Owner:Data:100",
external_id as `Ext ID::60`,
COALESCE(NULLIF(film_title,''), tape_title) as `Title`,
film_element as `Film Element::100`,
film_sound as `Film Sound::100`,
film_colour as `Film Colour::100`,
film_era as `Film Era::80`,
film_approximate_length_feet as `Film Length::100`,
is_checkerboard as `Is Checkerboard:Check:130`,
tape_standard as `Tape Standard::120`,
tape_manufacturer as `Tape Manufacturer::130`,
tape_run_time_mins as `Tape Runtime::120`,
drive_brand as `Drive Brand::100`,
drive_capacity as `Drive Capacity::120`,
drive_format as `Drive Format::100`,
has_datacable as `Cable:Check:60`,
has_psu as `PSU:Check:60`,
has_box as `Box:Check:60`,
content_description as 'Content::100',
notes as 'Notes::100'
from `tabMedia`
order by modified desc
